product_name: Stonewear Designs Lynx Pullover Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tailored with gathered cuffs and a classy shawl collar, the Stonewear Designs Lynx Pullover Top is ideal for busy women who run from work to workout to dinner out. Recycled polyester with spandex added for comfy stretch. Shawl collar keeps your neck warm and the simple shirring adds feminine style. Long sleeves feature a gathered cuff detail. Stonewear Designs Lynx Pullover Top features princess seams and double topstitching. Closeout.
short_description: Tailored with gathered cuffs and a classy shawl collar, the Stonewear Designs Lynx Pullover Top is ideal for busy women who run from work to workout to dinner out.
